name: Stay PUT
description:
In Stay PUT the objective is simple, choose the most odd looking fella before the whole place blows up. No complicated controls simply use your pointer and your dubious morality.  

(There is a chance once NPC's are shot, ragdolls wont spawn and look like the character simply disappeared. We couldn't find a solution to this bug unfortunately)

Editors Note: Our team had a blast making this silly little game, hope y'all enjoy it and see you next jam!

Collaborators...

Team Lead and Lead Programmer: J.

Sound Design: Angel

Creative Director: Rio
